short_description: Vocational and skill-based education focusing on practical training and industry readiness after Class 10.
description: Vocational stream offers direct entry into skill-based careers without traditional academics. Two main paths: Technical Skills (ITI/Polytechnic) for industry jobs with growth to supervisory or entrepreneurial roles, and Creative/Service Skills (Design, Media, Tourism, Healthcare) for immediate employment or freelance work. Provides lateral entry to degree programs.

paths.name: Technical Skills
paths.advancement: Lateral entry to B.Tech, upskilling, or business ownership
